features: Oral-B AA Battery powered toothbrush with replaceable brush heads reaches deep to remove plaque between teeth. (Batteries included)
Precision clean brush head delivers a dentist inspired tooth-by-tooth cleaning
Also try your Oral-B Pro-Health Clinical Battery Brush with other Oral-B Replacement Brush Heads: CrossAction, Sensitive Gum Care, FlossAction, 3D White
Oral-B is the #1 dentist-recommended toothbrush brand worldwide
body.description: Product Description Power up to a better clean with the Oral-B Pro-Health Clinical Battery Power Toothbrush. Your teeth and gums will feel pampered because you're removing more plaque than a regular manual toothbrush each time you brush. 2 AA Batteries included. Replace brush head every 3 months. Compatible with Oral-B Replacement Brush Heads: CrossAction, Sensitive Gum Care, FlossAction, 3D White. For best results use with Crest Pro-Health products: Crest Pro-Health Toothpaste, Crest Pro-Health Mouthwash and Oral-B Pro-Health Floss. Manufacturer Contact Information P&G Plaza, Cincinnati, OH 45202

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Oral-B Pro-Health Clinical Battery Toothbrush Power up to a better clean with the Oral-B Pro-Health Precision Clean battery-powered toothbrush. Your teeth and gums will feel pampered because you're removing more plaque than a regular manual toothbrush each time you brush.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Your Gateway to a Healthier Smile
reviews.reviewText: The Oral-B Pro-Health Clinical Battery Power Electric Toothbrush has revolutionized my dental care routine, providing an unmatched level of cleanliness and leaving my teeth feeling fresh and rejuvenated.One of the standout features of this toothbrush is its clinical-grade cleaning action. The powerful oscillating bristles effectively remove plaque, tartar, and surface stains, providing a dentist-like clean feeling after every use.I appreciate the convenience of a battery-powered toothbrush, as it offers portability and allows me to maintain excellent oral hygiene even when traveling or on the go. The pack of one includes everything I need, making it an economical and efficient choice.The toothbrush's ergonomic design fits comfortably in my hand, ensuring a secure grip during brushing sessions. This feature is especially helpful for children or those with limited dexterity.The two-minute timer with quadrant indicators encourages me to brush for the dentist-recommended time in each area of my mouth, ensuring a thorough and consistent clean.The colors may vary, adding a fun element to my oral care routine, and making it ideal for families with multiple users.Additionally, the replaceable brush head feature is a cost-effective and eco-friendly aspect, as I can simply change the brush head when it's time for renewal.The Oral-B Pro-Health Clinical Battery Power Electric Toothbrush has significantly improved my oral health, reducing plaque buildup and gum sensitivity. My dental check-ups have become more positive since incorporating this toothbrush into my routine.In conclusion, the Oral-B Pro-Health Clinical Battery Power Electric Toothbrush has exceeded my expectations, delivering professional-level cleaning in the comfort of my own home. Its clinical-grade performance, convenient battery power, and comfortable grip make it an exceptional choice for anyone seeking a healthier smile. If you desire an effective, easy-to-use, and dentist-approved oral care solution, I highly recommend the Oral-B Pro-Health Clinical Battery Power Electric Toothbrush for a brighter and more confident smile.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I Like This Electric Toothbrush
reviews.reviewText: I had purchased a more expensive electric toothbrush recently that vibrated 40,000 times per minute, but it caused my filling to come out on a front tooth (I had to go to my dentist to have it fixed). The high speed brush was also uncomfortable how it felt when in use. I returned the product. I like this Oral B toothbrush much better! It vibrates slower, but is pleasant to use. It doesn't have a timer, which I don't need anyway. Simple is better! The speed on this Oral B brush is perfect in my humble opinion. The speed is still high enough to get the job done. It works great and is simple to use. I recommend this toothbrush and think it is a really nice product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: For such an inexpensive battery-powered toothbrush, it works great! The first time I used it, it felt like I had gotten a professional polishing at the dentist’s.There are no instructions on using the timer, but the brush is quick and easy to use. I’m not sure how long the battery life is, but it’s sure to last a long while.If you want to go a step above regular brushing without paying a lot, this is the way to go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It does the job but drains batteries fast
reviews.reviewText: Updated review:In my original review I gave it 1 star and mentioned how it started to inexplicably malfunction after only a month of use.After additional troubleshooting, turns out, it was the battery. I had put brand new Duracell batteries in this thing when I got it, but it uses more power than other models I've used in the past. Thus, you have to change it out more often. I would say Duracell batteries run down in this device after a month of twice-daily use. Might be even shorter for cheaper brand batteries.When the battery is low it will turn on and off while you're brushing. It will also do that twitching thing randomly that it is only supposed to do when the 2 minute timer runs out. It only happens when the battery is low. I've tested this several times now and as soon as I put in a new battery, it works perfectly again.So, it isn't a malfunction like I originally thought, but there was no way I would've known that if I didn't troubleshoot. Changing my star rating to 5 stars since it does the job and makes it easier to know if I'm brushing for the dentist recommended 2 minutes.Original review:After a month, the toothbrush no longer spins. I noticed a few times that once the timer activates (where it'll vibrate for a few seconds) it would malfunction and stop spinning for a few seconds. But now, even after replacing the heads and troubleshooting, it continues to malfunction.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great tooth brush without the need to constantly charging
reviews.reviewText: I have been using the rechargeable toothbrush for at least 20 years. While those tooth brush don't need to replace battery, they have been a pain to use due to the need to constant charging. I decided to get rid of them and purchase this one instead. Boy, what a joy! I have been using it for a week now, and there is not even a sign the battery is weak. Since it uses normal batteries, I also don't need to bring my charger whenever I travel. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good cleaning without too much noise
reviews.reviewText: The dentistal hygenist really like how my tooth and gums are doing after using the toothbrush for a while. Very little plaque or staining, and the toothbrush is not as noisy as my previous electric toothbrush. It still makes a noise, but it's not as obnoxious. And I like the rotary action better than the vibrating style.
Love the power. Not too strong, not too light. Love that it helps to fight plaque. Love the timer feature. Love that I don’t have to keep it on my bathroom counter. Great purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very nice quality, I love it

reviews.reviewTitle: Für mich als Pensionist ist Gualität und PREISS sehr wichtig.Da
reviews.reviewText: Da ich mir einen Zahn abgebrochen habe (wird repariert) ist mir ein kleiner Putzkopf sehr wichtig um auch inder Zahnlücke Reinigung vorzunehmen.
Muy buen producto. La limpieza dental inmejorable. Recomiendo usar baterías recargables pues las consume rápido y el costo beneficio de comprar vs recargar puede pegar en el bolsillo.
